2.text: Pour 3 inches (7.6 cm) of water into a pot and bring it to a boil.

3.text: Turn the burner to medium and lower the eggs into the water.

4.text: Simmer the eggs for 4 to 5 minutes.

5.text: Transfer the eggs to egg cups.

6.text: Slice off the top quarter of the egg to access the yolk.

7.text: Put 2 slices of bread into the toaster.

8.text: Toast the bread slices until they're golden brown.

9.text: Spread butter over the slices and cut them into 1 inch (2.5 cm) strips.

10.text: Dip the toast strips into the dippy egg.
